info.name: R-Simple
info.description: A simple, elegant, and highly functional stylesheet for reddit. Not too many major changes, just a nice facelift.
info.additionalInfo:
Version 1.1: 
-upvote and downvote arrows are slightly nicer looking.
-link info box color scheme matches that of the theme in general.
-visited links are now black to distinguish links easier.

Note: Turn off custom subreddit stylesheets in your reddit preferences for the best experience.
